Articles.Content:
Hey folks,

Some of you may remember I did the [punk rock cover of the KSP Title theme](https://soundcloud.com/supersaturn/brave-kerbal-science) a while back. That was a lot of fun.

This time, I wanted to make a bit of more general space-faring music inspired by my love of KSP.

[KS1 Launch](https://supersaturn.bandcamp.com/track/ks1-launch) is meant to be an inspiring track about leaving the surface of Kerbin. (In my punk rock cover, I make reference to a vessel "KS1" which is the name I always give my starting vessels on a new campaign ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) the acronym is not that difficult to figure out lol) [The rest of the EP](https://supersaturn.bandcamp.com/album/albiorix-ep) is all quite lovely and spacey too, so maybe throw some of these tunes on while you fly!

Hope this makes some pilots happy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Fly safe!

Awesome! I just finished listening to your full album. You love the synth indeed ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif). A lot of elements in your songs remind me of the album "Galaxy" by the artist Jahzzar. I suggest you give it a listen ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). Again, very well done and an enjoyable listen.
Can you post it on SoundCloud please?

Thanks so much for the kind words! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I will definitely give Jahzzar a listen!

@Kaboom!: Your wish is my command. There is in fact already a version on SoundCloud:

[https://soundcloud.com/supersaturn/sets/albiorix-ep](https://soundcloud.com/supersaturn/sets/albiorix-ep)

And I put together a spacey

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hTpvb3HlnQI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 on YouTube.

Thank you! 
EDIT: Wow that is good.
Yay! Brave Kerbal Science is back!

> 
> Yay! Brave Kerbal Science is back!

Yahoo! I thought you'd never come back, jotapeh! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thank you!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I love KSP wayyyy too much, even if I am not terribly good at it. I think I'll do some science centre/mission control music for my next project.
